findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Declaration of state variables as immutable can save gas when defined.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code makes the contract more difficult to understand and maintain, increasing the size of the contract and deployment costs.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables with user-supplied input are missing checks for zero values, leading to unexpected behavior or errors.
